Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This extraordinary item holds immense value to me and I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. Given its significance, I am offering it to you at a special price of $950,000. This offer reflects my desire to share this unique piece with someone who appreciates its true worth. I look forward to hearing your response and the possibility of bringing this masterpiece into your possession. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $950,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $950,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $800,000
